title: Serverless Cron Jobs: Automatically Run Your Serverless Functions With QStash And Vercel
description:
Up your serverless game with serverless CRON JOBS. 

Now you can call any cloud function you build on a schedule with 0 manual work.
Vercel Cron Jobs are insanely simple to setup but their free usage is limited. 
If you're running simple daily functions, Cercel cron jobs will work fine.
If you need more cron jobs and smaller intervals, definitely use QStash over Vercel.


What's next for our Python based Notion powered Twitter app? Auto generating tweets using the new ChatGPT API üòé
